articles.author: Yashraj Sharma
articles.title: Putin visits India amid Ukraine peace push: What’s on the agenda? - Al Jazeera
articles.description: President Putin visits India as Russia faces pressure to end war in Ukraine, looking to boost bilateral trade deals.
articles.content: New Delhi, India Russian President Vladimir Putin is visiting India on Thursday for the first time since Moscow launched a full-scale invasion of Ukraine nearly four years ago, even as a renewed push… [+11321 chars]
